item.title: EXC
item.description: score:97 Chances: Exelon’s fourth-quarter earnings and revenues increased year over year, indicating a positive trend in the company’s financial performance. The company’s increased transmission spending reflects a strategic investment to address grid reliability concerns and capitalize on growing electricity demand from data centers.
